terms_text_0: Get Diamond - emotes The plan provides this service for free and is intended to be used. This page is used to inform visitors of my policy regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information if anyone decides to use my Services. If you choose to use my service, you consent to the collection and use of this information. The personal information I collect is used to provide and improve the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this privacy policy Terms used in this privacy policy have the same meaning as in our Terms and Conditions, available at Get Diamond - Emotes Tips, unless otherwise specified in this privacy policy.
terms_text_1: I appreciate your trust in providing us with your personal information, which is why we strive to protect it using acceptable customer practices. But remember that no method of transmission on the Internet, or method of electronic security, is 100% secure and reliable, I cannot guarantee its absolute security.
terms_text_2: These services are not intended for persons under the age of 13. I do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under the age of 13. If I discover that a child under the age of 13 has provided me with personal information, I immediately delete it from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact me so that I can take action.
terms_text_3: I may update our privacy policy from time to time. You are therefore advised to check this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting a new privacy policy on this page.
terms_text_4: Please note that making changes to the App or its components is strictly prohibited and may result in a violation of our Terms of Service.

otherPassive_3_0_text_0: Invest in vending machines and place them in strategic locations.
otherPassive_3_0_text_1: Stock machines with popular snacks or beverages.
otherPassive_3_1_text_0: Invest in vending machines for water, soft drinks, or other beverages.
otherPassive_4_0_text_0: Invest in renewable energy projects like solar or wind farms.
otherPassive_4_0_text_1: Earn income from energy production and sales.
otherPassive_4_1_text_0: Purchase rights to extract minerals from land.
otherPassive_4_2_text_0: Provide capital to a business as a limited partner.
otherPassive_4_2_text_1: Receive a share of the profits without being involved in daily operations.
otherPassive_5_0_text_0: Procure high-quality equipment that fulfills market demand, such as tools, electronics, or recreational gear.
otherPassive_5_0_text_1: Advertise your rental business through online platforms, local directories, and social media.
otherPassive_5_1_text_0: Purchase and rent out vintage or classic cars for events, photoshoots, or special occasions.
otherPassive_5_1_text_1: Generate passive income from rental fees.
otherPassive_5_2_text_0: Offer legal advice and services in various areas of law, such as business law, intellectual property, or contracts.
otherPassive_5_2_text_1: Provide assistance with legal documents, negotiations, and dispute resolution.
otherPassive_5_3_title: Invest in a Fitness Center or Gym
otherPassive_5_3_text_0: Invest in a gym or fitness center, either by owning it outright or as a part owner.
otherPassive_5_3_text_1: Earn passive income from membership fees and class registrations.
otherPassive_6_0_text_0: Plant and cultivate trees for timber, fruits, or nuts.
otherPassive_6_0_text_1: Earn income from selling mature trees or tree products.
otherPassive_6_1_text_0: Providing support services to agricultural operations.
otherPassive_6_1_text_1: Includes machinery repair, crop consulting, and soil testing.
otherPassive_6_2_text_0: Combines agriculture and tourism to offer farm-based experiences.
otherPassive_6_2_text_1: Includes farm stays, tours, and educational activities.
otherPassive_6_3_text_0: Growing crops in a controlled environment.
otherPassive_6_3_text_1: Allows for year-round production and protection from weather.
